private  JSONObject loginFromServer(String uName, String password)
          Attempt to login user with username/pw If successful, returns JSON account object Performs the following query on the server database: SELECT AccountID, Username, EmailAddress, Password, Image, Description, Location, Quote, Type, Visibility, CreatedDateTime, RatingScore FROM accounts WHERE Username='".$username."' AND Password=MD5('".$password."')

Method Detail

login

public ReturnInfo login(String uName,
                        String password)
This method will perform a login operation to the server. If the network is down then the login operation will be performed against the cache database.

Parameters:
uName - The username used to login
password - The password used to login
Returns:
A ReturnInfo structure is used to identify the result of the login

loginFromServer

private JSONObject loginFromServer(String uName,
                                   String password)
Attempt to login user with username/pw If successful, returns JSON account object Performs the following query on the server database: SELECT AccountID, Username, EmailAddress, Password, Image, Description, Location, Quote, Type, Visibility, CreatedDateTime, RatingScore FROM accounts WHERE Username='".$username."' AND Password=MD5('".$password."')

login

public ReturnInfo login(int id,
                        String password)
This method will perform a login operation to the server. If the network is down then the login operation will be performed against the cache database.

Parameters:
id - The ID associated with this user
password - The password used to login
Returns:
A ReturnInfo structure is used to identify the result of the login

loginFromServer

public JSONObject loginFromServer(int id,
                                  String password)
Attempt to login user with ID/pw If successful, returns JSON account object Performs following DB request on server: SELECT AccountID, Username, EmailAddress, Password, Image, Description, Location, Quote, Type, Visibility, CreatedDateTime, RatingScore FROM accounts WHERE AccountID=".$id." AND Password='".$password."'"

getUser

public com.hci.geotagger.Objects.UserAccount getUser(String username)
Get a UserAccount record based on a username from the server. If the network is not up then the record will be retrieved from the cache.

Parameters:
username - The user name of the UserAccount
Returns:
The UserAccount record retrieved from the database or cache

getUserFromServer

private JSONObject getUserFromServer(String username)

registerUser

public ReturnInfo registerUser(String name,
                               String password)
This method will register the input username and password. The result is returned as a ReturnInfo object. There is no object returned within the ReturnInfo object.

Parameters:
name - a string that represents the username
password - a string that represents the user's password
Returns:
a ReturnInfo object that identifies the status of the operation
